thread.section_title: RapidAdvance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RapidAdvance | www.rapidadvance.com
thread.title: John Jardine III
thread.title_full: RapidAdvance reviewed by John Jardine III

author: John Jardine III
title: John Jardine III
text: Zach and Keri were very friendly and promply answered phone calls. Although my business is in a transition phase... from a sole proprietorship to an LLC, Keri gave me advice for a short term loan to help me with a cash flow problem, and told me what I needed to do in order to qualify for a 300k loan in 3 to 6 months that will help me get to the next level of growth. I felt comfortable talking with her and I plan on calling her back when I get my books in order. I had a 5* experience dealing with their knowledgeable and courteous staff, and I hope this leads to a very prosperous business relationship in the future!
